Headline: 95th-bound Red Line  Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line  Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 87th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line  Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 87th. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
